data.meta_site_name: Lion and Lamb Apologetics | Teaching the Truth of God's Word
data.text:
What is Bethel Church, Redding, CA?

Got Questions

Bethel Church, Redding is firmly within the New Apostolic Reformation movement, which is unbiblical and spiritually dangerous. It can be characterized as promoting Word of Faith teaching, the prosperity gospel, dominionism, “grave sucking,” and other aberrant doctrines and practices.

The Doctrine of Bethel Church

Living Biblically

Bethel Church is a member of the New Apostolic Reformation. Bill Johnson, the head of Bethel Church, is recognized as a modern-day apostle in the NAR, and Kris Vallotton, also of Bethel, is recognized as a modern-day prophet. Excellent! Check out all videos and imbedded links!

Bethel’s False Teaching on Healing

Rick Becker

Bethel Church has the audacity to charge $165 per individual for a slice of pie in the sky. Their “pie in the sky” is the false teaching that physical healing in this life is guaranteed in the atonement. $165 for a baloney sandwich is too much!

Kingdom Come in California?

Martyn Wendell Jones

Some visitors of Bethel Church claim to be healed. Others claim to receive direct words from God. Is it “real”—or is it dangerous? I visited the campus as a curious skeptic, and this is what I heard and saw.

10 (BIG!) Reasons Why You Should RUN AWAY From Bethel Redding

Steven Kozar

Excellent online presentation by Steven Kozar.

Contains supporting videos and links which you should view.

9 Things You Should Know About the Bethel Church Movement

Joe Carter

The Gospel Coalition Australia recently published an article examining the theology and practice of the Bethel movement. Well documented! Be sure to view the videos and the links!

Warning: Avoid Bill Johnson and Bethel Church!

Apologetics Index

Multiple resources on the theological and ethical problems related to Bill Johnson Ministries, Bethel Church Redding, and Bethel Music. Well documented and highly recommended!

Bethel Church Preaches WHAT NOW?!

Colin A. Miller

Excellent exposé from Fight For Truth!

At What Price Awakening? Examining the Theology and Practice of the Bethel Movement

Stephen Tan

As a pastor of an Australian church, I too am passionate to see revival happen in Australia. There is, however, a huge difference between revival and revivalism!

Book Review: When Heaven Invades Earth, by Bill Johnson

David Schrock

Heresy isn’t merely theological error; it’s error that tampers with our understanding of God and Christ and threatens, if not completely undermines, our standing before him. Historically, heresy has been saved for matters that deny the Trinity or reject the early church councils.

Responding to the False Teaching of Bethel Church, Jesus Culture, and Todd White

Gabriel Hughes

Very interesting rebuttals to questions from readers.

Bethel and Bill Johnson’s Bridge to the New Age and Spiritual Fakery

Mike Winger

This is an excellent two-hour video exposé!

Highly recommended!

Justin Peters EXPOSES the Truth about Bethel Music

Justin Peters

Highly recommended exposé from Justin Peters and why your church should not play their music! Ever!

What Goes On At Bethel School of Supernatural Ministry (BSSM): You Will Be Utterly Shocked!

Justin Peters

This is a shocking video from inside the Bethel School of Supernatural Ministry that is dark beyond comprehension!

Wonder If Bethel Is A False Church? Wonder No More

Justin Peters

Many people view Bethel Church pastored by Bill Johnson as a church with definite charismatic excesses but it still preaches the real Jesus and the real Gospel. But does it?

Proof Bethel Church Should be Shut Down | Get Out NOW!

Jordan Riley

Bethel Music Is More DANGEROUS Than You Thought!

Colin A. Miller

Excellent exposé from Fight For Truth!
